component.name: AusweisApp2
component.summary: Official authentication app for German ID card and residence permit

description.p: The AusweisApp2 is a software, that you can install on your Computer/Smartphone/Tablet, to identify yourself online with your ID card or your electronic residence permit. The App is availible for the most used operating systems and works in all common browsers.
The AusweisApp2 offers you an intigrated self-assessment where you are able to view your data that is stored on the online ID.
In the app you will also find an overview with the available services, a running overview and you can manage your PIN there.
This app is on behalf of the Federal Office for Information Security.
